abstract.text: Handles tap-like interaction using click / double-click DOM events.
Handles drag updates using SHTML JavaScript DSL.
Set scrollbar width with custom value
A SwiftUI-inspired framework for generating HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with complete type safety.
Set scrollbar width with length value
Handles long-press by scheduling action after the minimum duration.
Handles drag updates and optional drag end, and enables dragging.
Set scrollbar color with single color
